pullRequest.title: Migrate SysV init tests from bats to java packaging
pullRequest.bodyText:
This commit converts the sysv init tests from bats tests into the java
packaging tests. Since it is the last oss specific test, the bats oss
test task is also removed.
relates #46005

commit.message:
Migrate SysV init tests from bats to java packaging

This commit converts the sysv init tests from bats tests into the java
packaging tests. Since it is the last oss specific test, the bats oss
test task is also removed.

relates #46005

nodes.bodyText: Why do we need this check?
I looks like we skip this when systemd is around.
